message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance to us, we are offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an item that could potentially be worth $1,000,000 to you. We hope this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in this product, $1,200,000 is unfortunately above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for it, which is still a good deal for you considering your valuation. Let me know if you're open to that price.
